https://www.alphavantage.co/query?functi.sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
https://www.alphavantage.co/query?functi.relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.
